input.sentences: our day started at the festival with our little girl excited .
there was a stage and performers that were playing .
the dragon character was greeting my girl .
the festival had a model building that looked very interesting .
the little girl rode the horse on the ride .
output.sentences: I took a girl to the festival and the curtain was open, indicating the entertainment started.
There were many performers playing instruments on the stage.
My girl gave a hello greeting to a man in a dragon costume.
My girl looked like a model compared to the other chicks at that festival.
She wanted to end the night by taking  ride on a horse so we rode it.
